section.title: Copy a pinboard
section.p: You can make a copy of a pinboard if you would plan to make edits without overwriting the original pinboard. When you save a copy, you can use a new pinboard name.

li.p: Click Pinboards, on the top navigation bar.
On the pinboard list page, click the pinboard you would like to copy.

fig.title: Make a copy of the pinboard

li.p: Give your pinboard a new name and description, and then click Save.
